ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: until what day is that deferred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For what day is that time fixed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: To which Day has this task been deferred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If one asks, "To which day have such calamitous events been postponed?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For which day were they appointed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: For what Day are these signs postponed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: To what day is the doom fixed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: to what day shall they be delayed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For what day is the time appointed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: for what Day has this been appointed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: For what day is it timed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —for what day has [all] that been set [to occur]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For what Day are these signs postponed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: to what day shall they be deferred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Until which day is it deferred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For what Day was it postponed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:12] For what day — for a tremendous day — has it been appointed?, [it has been appointed] for witnessing [of the messengers] against their communities [to the effect] that they delivered [their messages from God].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For what day is the time appointed) for these things? He says: for what day has its Master delayed it.
